titleStmt.title: An Excellent and most-pleasant new sonnet shewing how the goddess Diana transform'd Acteon into the shape of a hart.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.O. and sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: "An Excellent song called Lullaby" has been variously attributed to Nicholas Breton and George Gasgoigne. Harvard attributes it to Breton. cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and British Library.
With: An Excellent song call'd Lullaby.
